@dev Pauses the contract should that ever be needed.
@return result true or false

nodes.documentation: @title Bribes.

nodes.name: LogBribeReported
reportBribe
bribeDetails

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the number of bribes reported to this contract
@return number number of bribes known to this contract
nodes.name: numberOfBribes

nodes.documentation:
@dev Fallback function - Called if other functions don't match call or
     sent ether without data. Typically, called when invalid data is sent
     Added so ether sent to this contract is reverted if the contract fails
     otherwise, the sender's money is transferred to contract

nodes.documentation:
@dev Fallback function - Called if other functions don't match call or
     sent ether without data. Typically, called when invalid data is sent
     Added so ether sent to this contract is reverted if the contract fails
     otherwise, the sender's money is transferred to contract

bribeDetails(uint32).details: Gets the ipfsHash for a given bribe

params.bribeId: Id of the bribe for which the ipfs hash is being requested

bribeDetails(uint32).return: ipfsHash ipfsHash for the requested bribe

numberOfBribes().details: Returns the number of bribes reported to this contract
numberOfBribes().return: number number of bribes known to this contract

pause().details: Pauses the contract should that ever be needed.

reportBribe(string,uint256).details: Stores the reported bribe to the contract.

params.ipfsHash: Hash of the Ipfs file where details of the bribe are stored.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership to a different owner.
